channel.title: [Class] The Squire and the Page
channel.description:
With no Priest, no one can bring back a class that died, and BD has one less support class. But with Squire, there can be more protection for BD alongside being able to have important classes affect the game even after their original player is dead. For both Squire and Page, they get access to a secondary limited ability that can assist their faction before they change their class. And the best part is that people can leave the game after they die and people can still take their class.
#### Note: Taken and Modified from FoL Squire.
[quote]
# [color=seablue]The Squire[/color]
[color=seablue]Blue Dragon Support[/color]
**Vigilant (Passive)** - You are death immune on nights you successfully use an ability. **Promote (Night)** - Choose a dead, non-unique, Blue Dragon class. You will become that class at the start of the next day. Will fail if your target was defiled or lifted. - oo uses **Shieldbearer (Night)** - Choose a player. Make that player immune to death tonight. - 2 uses
[/quote] [quote] # [color=purple]The Page[/color]
[color=purple]Unseen Support[/color]
**Vigilant (Passive)** - You are death immune on nights you successfully use an ability. **Divest (Night)** - Choose a dead, non-unique, Blue Dragon or Unseen class. You will become that class, or the convert form of a Blue Dragon class, at the start of the next day. Will fail if your target was defiled or lifted. - oo uses **Cloakbearer (Night)** - Guarantee that the Assassin's attack is hidden from visit checking tonight and bypasses visit prevention. - 1 use [/quote]

item.title: [Class] The Squire and the Page
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Basically this:

Squire

Blue Dragon Support

Alert! (Passive) - You are immune to death on nights you successfully use an ability

Promote (Night) - Chose a dead player. You will become their starting class if it is a non-unique Blue Dragon class at the start of the day, otherwise this ability fails. Does not count as a vist - oo uses
Shieldbearer (Night) - Make target player immune to death tonight. - 2 uses

The Page

Unseen Support

Alert! (Passive) - You are immune to death on nights you successfully use an ability

Divest (Night) - Chose a dead player. If their starting class is a non-unique Blue Dragon class you will become their converted version at the start of the day, otherwise this ability fails. Does not count as a vist - oo uses
Cloakbearer (Night) - The Assassin’s ability’s won’t count as a visit tonight and they will bypass visit prevention - 1 use

Read full topic

item.title: [Class] The Squire and the Page
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Livicus:

Promote (Night) - Choose a dead, non-unique, Blue Dragon class. You will become that class at the start of the next day. Will fail if your target was defiled or lifted. - oo uses

Best way to word this:

Promote (Night) - Chose a dead player. You will become their starting class if it is a non-unique Blue Dragon class at the start of the day, otherwise this ability fails. Does not count as a vist - oo uses

and for Page:

Divest (Night) - Chose a dead player. If it is a non-unique Blue Dragon class you will become their converted version at the start of the day, otherwise this ability fails. Does not count as a vist - oo uses

Read full topic
